REF: YC-1036 Align naming for config files and variables

RENAMED FILES
=============
yc-ws-cluster.xml -> ws-cluster.xml
yc-jgroups-udp.xml -> jgroups-udp.xml
yc-license.txt -> license.txt
yc-config.properties -> config.properties

yc-preview.css -> preview.css
yc.css -> main.css

logback.xml -> all logs now have prefix "cw-"

yc.xml -> core.xml
ycp.xml -> payment.xml


RENAMED VALUES
==============

All UI components yc-* -> cw-*
ycProhibitedFields -> coreProhibitedFields
ycpProhibitedFields -> paymentProhibitedFields
